ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] E Karana (was Unrest Sucks)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... . *sigh* This list is going to keep me from ever playing the Enchanter I have been working so hard to start. :o) Yup, you were right, for me at low 25 Crag
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Nathaniel Clark <nkclark@...>
>
>I maintain EK is excellent for 22-about 26 or so :)


. *sigh* This list is going to keep me from ever playing the Enchanter I
have been working so hard to start. :o) Yup, you were right, for me at low
25 Crag spiders were a blast, and on a whim I included melifluous Motion, it
was really kind of useful! My banks for last night:

(1)
1:lute
2:horn
3:DDD
4:CoD
5:Largos Binding
6: Hymn

(2)
1:lute
2:horn
3:DDD
4:CoD
5:Selos Chain (for pulling and runners, since the spiders don't run I think
I will change to bellow)
6: Hymn

(3) The Brave Sir Robin Bank
1:lute
2:horn
3:Drum
4:Selos Accelerondo
5:Melifluous Motion
6: Hymn

When it looked like the spider was winning I hit MMotion, then selos and
armed the drum, ran till the spider was no longer chasing me, healed and
went back to try again. Since the spider was still agro it found *me* once I
got close enough. I thiiink I am going to ask for that collar of Undead
Protection back from the Enchanter for a bit, I could use the +7 poison...

Thanks again, for a break I may go visit the Hermit, or Najina, or...gah, I
am hooked again.

Tszaaz
